infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: OTAssist uses the camera to capture photos inside the app before you publish them.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: OTAssist uses the microphone to record audio clips that stay with your in-app creations.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: OTAssist accesses your photo library to let you choose media that appears in the app.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: OTAssist uses your location to show nearby content and services while you use the app.
